## Try R Chapter 6

### Data Frames

### Пример
### Data Frames
```{r} 
chests <- c('gold', 'silver', 'gems', 'gold', 'gems')
types <- factor(chests)
# ---
print(chests)
print(types)
levels(types)
# ---
weights <- c(300, 200, 100, 250, 150)
prices <- c(9000, 5000, 12000, 7500, 18000)
# ---
print(weights)
print(prices)
# ---
treasure <- data.frame(weights, prices, types)
print(treasure)
```

### Пример
### Data Frame Access
```{r} 
treasure[[2]]
treasure[["weights"]]
treasure$prices
treasure[["types"]]
# ---
```

### Пример
### Merging Data Frames
```{r} 
targets <- read.csv("targets.csv", as.is = TRUE, sep=";")
infantry <- read.table("infantry.txt", sep="\t", header=TRUE)
# ---
mrg <- merge(x = targets, y = infantry)
mrg
```
